set(TARGET_NAME cvtt)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

file(GLOB_RECURSE CVTT_HEADER_FILES RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} *.h)
file(GLOB_RECURSE CVTT_SOURCE_FILES RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} *.cpp)

set(ALL_CODE_FILES ${CVTT_HEADER_FILES} ${CVTT_SOURCE_FILES})
GROUP_FILES(ALL_CODE_FILES)

add_library(${TARGET_NAME} STATIC ${ALL_CODE_FILES})
set_target_properties(${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX FOLDER "libraries")
